title: Episode 120: Little Moments with Edan Lepucki
itunes:title: Episode 120: Little Moments with Edan Lepucki
itunes:subtitle: Kate and Doree reflect on Mother’s Day, and the many emotions — both good and bad — that come along with it. Then, Edan Lepucki, editor of Mother’s Before, joins them to discuss the complexity of the mother-daughter relationship, her passion for journa...
description:
Kate and Doree reflect on Mother’s Day, and the many emotions — both good and bad — that come along with it. Then, Edan Lepucki, editor of Mother’s Before, joins them to discuss the complexity of the mother-daughter relationship, her passion for journaling, why masturbation is self-care, and her favorite lube.


To leave a voicemail for a future episode, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
